announcements.title: Extended Library Hours During Finals
announcements.content: The library will remain open 24/7 during finals week from March 15th to March 29th. Additional study spaces will be available on the second floor.

announcements.title: New Database Subscriptions
announcements.content: We've added access to JSTOR Arts & Sciences XII Collection and ProQuest Historical Newspapers. Training sessions available next week.

announcements.title: Library Workshop Series
announcements.content: Join us for our spring workshop series on advanced research methods, citation management, and digital literacy.

events.title: Research Workshop: Advanced Database Searching
events.description: Learn advanced techniques for searching academic databases effectively. Topics include Boolean operators, field searching, and citation analysis.

events.title: Author Talk: Dr. Sarah Johnson
events.description: Join us for a discussion with Dr. Sarah Johnson about her new book on environmental sustainability in urban planning.

events.title: Special Collections Exhibition
events.description: Exploring our rare books collection featuring first editions from the 19th century.

databases.name: JSTOR
databases.description: Digital library of academic journals, books, and primary sources

databases.name: Science Direct
databases.description: Leading platform for peer-reviewed scholarly literature

databases.name: PubMed Central
databases.description: Free archive of biomedical and life sciences journal literature

databases.name: IEEE Xplore
databases.description: Research database for technology and engineering
